description: This file is a Python source file that implements a logging utility. It wraps an external logging module by providing a function to create and return a logger with specific options.

methods.name: Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False)
methods.description: Creates and returns a new Log object from the external logging module, with specified configurations.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False):$/
ctags.signature: (name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False)
